prontera,142,180,6	script	백화점 직원	MD_BETELGEUSE,{
	mes "[백화점 직원]";
	mes "요즘 성좌의 탑이 한가해서 용돈벌이하러 나왔다.";
	mes "무엇이 필요한가?";
	next;

	while (true) {
		switch(select("소비 아이템:펫 테이밍:펫 먹이:4차직업용 소모템:직업별 소모템:종료")) {
			case 1:
				callshop "Consumables";
				close;
			case 2:
				callshop "PetTaming";
				close;
			case 3:
				callshop "PetFood";
				close;
			case 4:
				callshop "FourthJobMats";
				close;
			case 5:
				callshop "JobSpecificMats";
				close;
			case 6:
				mes "단골이 되었으면 좋겠군.";
				close;
		}
	}
}

-	shop	Consumables	-1,12221:-1,23648:1000000:-1
-	shop	PetTaming	-1,643:20000:-1,12846:20000:-1,619:20000:-1,620:20000:-1,621:20000:-1,622:20000:-1,623:20000:-1,624:20000:-1,625:20000:-1,626:20000:-1,627:20000:-1,628:20000:-1,629:20000:-1,630:20000:-1,631:20000:-1,632:20000:-1,633:20000:-1,634:20000:-1,635:20000:-1,636:20000:-1,637:20000:-1,638:20000:-1,639:20000:-1,640:20000:-1,641:20000:-1,642:20000:-1,659:20000:-1,660:20000:-1,661:20000:-1,9897:20000:-1,12225:20000:-1,12340:20000:-1,12358:20000:-1,12359:20000:-1,12360:20000:-1,12361:20000:-1,12362:20000:-1,12363:20000:-1,12364:20000:-1,12365:20000:-1,12366:20000:-1,12367:20000:-1,12368:20000:-1,12369:20000:-1,12370:20000:-1,12371:20000:-1,12372:20000:-1,12373:20000:-1,12374:20000:-1,12395:20000:-1,12408:20000:-1,14569:20000:-1,12699:20000:-1,14570:20000:-1,14571:20000:-1,14572:20000:-1,14573:20000:-1,14574:20000:-1,23187:20000:-1,23188:20000:-1,23189:20000:-1,23256:20000:-1,100796:20000:-1,101331:20000:-1,102202:20000:-1,102869:20000:-1,102723:20000:-1
